CustomField.defaultValue: "Our company policy allows us to only grant credit to FIDI/OMNI agents." & BR() & "Unless otherwise agreed we must insist on payment before arrival of the shipment, either by payment in advance or by a certified cheque, to be sent by courier or be enclosed with shipping documents." & BR() & "KINDLY NOTE THAT FOR ANY PAYMENTS MADE THROUGH INTER-BANK - ALL BANK TRANSFER FEES WILL BE BORNE BY THE REMITTER."
CustomField.label: Payment Terms
